text: xahrab chaw chnbth klaw wa rea sraththa læw cng klaw theid muhammad wa phwk than yang midi sraththa tæ cng klaw theid wa rea khea rab xislam læw pheraa kar sraththa yang midi khea su hawcı khxng phwk than læa tha hak phwk than cheuxfang ptibati ta mxallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh læw phraxngkh ca mi thahı kar ngan khxng phwk than dxy lng tæ prakar dı thæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx
